page.title: 18STOCKTON -- OUR TOWN
page.content: What I like about Stockton is that there is plenty of nightlife and plenty of supermarkets like Hintons, Tesco, Asda. There is also a twice weekly market along the length of the High Street. There is the Green Dragon Yard Museum telling us about the history of Stockton. We have a town hall in the centre of the High Street which has been rebuilt and is very nice to look at. We have quite a few pool clubs and amusement arcades. THe things I dislike about Stockton are that there are not enough disco's for our age and there is no ice-rink. Also you can't go to the parks at night time because of the 'joeys' and 'skinheads' fighting. At Christmas time we have carol singers in the town, carnivals, decorated buses, coloured lights, brass bands and Santa Claus. {Dawn Stephenson
